short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your productivity with One Hour Focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One Hour Focus is your ultimate tool for maximizing productivity and maintaining laser focus. Whether you're working on a critical project, studying for an exam, or simply need uninterrupted time to concentrate, this extension is designed to help you achieve your goals efficiently.

Key Features:

Simple Task Input: Easily add tasks you want to focus on. Input your task, and the timer starts immediately, giving you a clear, focused countdown of one hour to complete your task.

Automatic Task Deletion: Once the timer hits zero, your task is automatically deleted, keeping your task list clutter-free and encouraging you to stay on track.
Grace Period: Need a little extra time? Use the one-time grace button to extend your timer by 20 minutes, ensuring you can finish up without stress.

Task Management: Effortlessly delete selected tasks with a single click using the common delete button, streamlining your task list management.

Dark Mode: Enjoy a sleek, dark interface that's easy on the eyes, perfect for late-night focus sessions.

Support the Developer: Love the extension? Support its development by clicking the "Buy Me a Coffee" button, right within the extension.

Why Choose One Hour Focus?

User-Friendly Interface: A clean, intuitive design makes it easy to stay organized and focused.

Boosted Productivity: Designed to help you maintain a consistent, distraction-free workflow for an hour at a time.

Effortless Task Management: Simplifies your workflow with automatic task deletion and easy task management features.

Version 1.1 update:

Timer bug fixed.
